question: Mathadhis building for Budhanilkantha Narayan Temple was recently inaugurated .The temple is situated in which city?
explanation: Ambassador of India to Nepal Manjeev Singh Puri inaugurated Mathadhis building for Shree Budhanilkantha Narayan Temple in Kathmandu. Budhanilkantha temple is situated at the foot of Shivpuri hills in Kathmandu valley. It is s a Hindu open air temple dedicated to Lord Vishnu.
